description: [InvisiMole](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0260) can use Data Protection API to encrypt its components on the victimâ€™s computer, to evade detection, and to make sure the payload can only be decrypted and loaded on one specific compromised computer.(Citation: ESET InvisiMole June 2020)
